title: Ticket #907: dead collector avoidance produces spurious messages
description:
The message that was displayed was: 

Collector <blah> is still being avoided if an alternative succeeds.

In addition to confusing noise in the logs, this would sometimes result in the backup collector being queried instead of the primary collector.
check_ins:
2009-Nov-04 10:38   Check-in [25092]: Documented fix for spurious collector avoidance problem. #907 (By Dan Bradley )
2009-Oct-16 17:37   Check-in [16113]: Fixed a problem that resulted in spurious messages about avoiding the collector. The message that was displayed was: Collector <blah> is still being avoided if an alternative succeeds.  [...] (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
